mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(userId, password, nickname, email, birthDate, gender, mannerPointSum, evaluatedCount, alcoholPoint, username) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{mannerPointSum}, #{evaluatedCount}, #{alcoholPoint}, #{username})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password=#{password}, nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, birthDate=#{birthDate}, alcoholPoint=#{alcoholPoint} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT mannerPointSum FROM User WHERE userId = #{userId}
